long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension for switching up the pieces on Lichess. Note that the game isn't effected, only the sprites that you see on your end. Why? That's a very good question...

I am not responsible for any ELO losses or brain aneurysms that you may experience as a result of using this extension.
